question:
A custom JSP tag must be able to support an arbitrary number of attributes whose names are
unknown when the tag class is designed. Which two are true? (Choose two.)

options.A: The <body-content> element in the echo tag TLD must have the value JS
options.B: The echo tag handler must define the setAttribute(String key, String value) method.
options.C: The <dynamic-attributes>true</dynamic-attributes> element must appear in the echo tag TL
options.E: The class implementing the echo tag handler must implement the javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag interface.
options.F: The class implementing the echo tag handler must implement the javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.DynamicAttributes interface.
